events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred at an intersection leading to significant front-end damage to their vehicle.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to involvement of a vehicle collision as described by the claimant.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to handle further communications and process the claim.
The claim was acknowledged promptly by the insurer, and confirmation was sent to the claimant to reassure them.
The claimant was requested to provide photos of the damaged vehicle and a police report to proceed with investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photos of the vehicle damage and the official police accident report.
The insurance investigation team started reviewing the case documentation and prepared to inspect the vehicle in person.
The investigation concluded after confirming the extent of the damage and verifying claim details with involved parties.
A settlement offer was proposed based on repair estimates and coverage limits, communicated to the claimant for review.
The claimant responded with positive feedback regarding the clarity and fairness of the proposed settlement.
Following the customerâ€™s acceptance, the claim was officially approved for payment disbursal to cover damages.
The payment was processed and issued to the claimant's designated bank account as per the approved settlement.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation of payment receipt and no further issues reported by the claimant.
All claim documents and correspondence were archived in the system for long-term record keeping and future reference.
